p: Data reporting the effects of mycorrhizal inoculation on the growth and the chlorophyll synthesis of lemongrass are presented ( TableÂ 1). The T-test revealed a significantly higher collar diameter (p = 0.02), branching (p = 0.015) and total chlorophyll synthesis in mycorrhizal lemongrass [(+)AMF] compared to the non-inoculated counterpart [(-)AMF]. Likewise, the Mycorrhizal efficiency (ME), indicating the increase in growth parameters of AMF-inoculated plants over the uninoculated ones showed a substantial accumulation in biomass production upon mycorrhization.
